title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 39 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 39 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Knowest thou the time when the wild goats of the rock bring forth? or canst thou mark when the hinds do calve?
lineList.cn: 山岩间的野山羊几时生产，你知道吗。母鹿下犊之期，你能察定吗。

lineList.en: Canst thou number the months that they fulfil? or knowest thou the time when they bring forth?
lineList.cn: 它们怀胎的月数，你能数算吗。它们几时生产，你能晓得吗。

lineList.en: They bow themselves, they bring forth their young ones, they cast out their sorrows.
lineList.cn: 它们屈身，将子生下，就除掉疼痛。

lineList.en: Their young ones are in good liking, they grow up with corn; they go forth, and return not unto them.
lineList.cn: 这子渐渐肥壮，在荒野长大，去而不回。

lineList.en: Who hath sent out the wild ass free? or who hath loosed the bands of the wild ass?
lineList.cn: 谁放野驴出去自由。谁解开快驴的绳索。

lineList.en: Whose house I have made the wilderness, and the barren land his dwellings.
lineList.cn: 我使旷野作它的住处，使咸地当它的居所。

lineList.en: He scorneth the multitude of the city, neither regardeth he the crying of the driver.
lineList.cn: 它嗤笑城内的喧囔，不听赶牲口的喝声。

lineList.en: The range of the mountains is his pasture, and he searcheth after every green thing.
lineList.cn: 遍山是它的草场。它寻梢各样青绿之物。

lineList.en: Will the unicorn be willing to serve thee, or abide by thy crib?
lineList.cn: 野牛岂肯服事你。岂肯住在你的槽旁。

lineList.en: Canst thou bind the unicorn with his band in the furrow? or will he harrow the valleys after thee?
lineList.cn: 你岂能用套绳将野牛笼在犁沟之间。它岂肯随你耙山谷之地。

lineList.en: Wilt thou trust him, because his strength is great? or wilt thou leave thy labour to him?
lineList.cn: 岂可因它的力大就倚靠它。岂可把你的工交给它做吗。

lineList.en: Wilt thou believe him, that he will bring home thy seed, and gather it into thy barn?
lineList.cn: 岂可信靠它把你的粮食运到家，又收聚你禾场上的谷吗。

lineList.en: Gavest thou the goodly wings unto the peacocks? or wings and feathers unto the ostrich?
lineList.cn: 鸵鸟的翅膀欢然扇展，岂是显慈爱的翎毛和羽毛吗。

lineList.en: Which leaveth her eggs in the earth, and warmeth them in dust,
lineList.cn: 因它把蛋留在地上，在尘土中使得温暖。

lineList.en: And forgetteth that the foot may crush them, or that the wild beast may break them.
lineList.cn: 却想不到被脚踹碎，或被野兽践踏。

lineList.en: She is hardened against her young ones, as though they were not hers: her labour is in vain without fear;
lineList.cn: 它忍心待雏，似乎不是自己的。虽然徒受劳苦，也不为雏惧怕。

lineList.en: Because God hath deprived her of wisdom, neither hath he imparted to her understanding.
lineList.cn: 因为神使它没有智慧，也未将悟性赐给它。

lineList.en: What time she lifteth up herself on high, she scorneth the horse and his rider.
lineList.cn: 它几时挺身展开翅膀，就嗤笑马和骑马的人。

lineList.en: Hast thou given the horse strength? hast thou clothed his neck with thunder?
lineList.cn: 马的大力是你所赐的吗。它颈项上？？挲的鬃是你给它披上的吗。

lineList.en: Canst thou make him afraid as a grasshopper? the glory of his nostrils is terrible.
lineList.cn: 是你叫它跳跃像蝗虫吗。它喷气之威使人惊惶。

lineList.en: He paweth in the valley, and rejoiceth in his strength: he goeth on to meet the armed men.
lineList.cn: 它在谷中刨地，自喜其力。它出去迎接佩带兵器的人。

lineList.en: He mocketh at fear, and is not affrighted; neither turneth he back from the sword.
lineList.cn: 它嗤笑可怕的事并不惊惶，也不因刀剑退回。

lineList.en: The quiver rattleth against him, the glittering spear and the shield.
lineList.cn: 箭袋和发亮的枪，并短枪在它身上铮铮有声。

lineList.en: He swalloweth the ground with fierceness and rage: neither believeth he that it is the sound of the trumpet.
lineList.cn: 它发猛烈的怒气将地吞下。一听角声就不耐站立。

lineList.en: He saith among the trumpets, Ha, ha; and he smelleth the battle afar off, the thunder of the captains, and the shouting.
lineList.cn: 角每发声，它说呵哈。它从远处闻着战气，又听见军长大发雷声，和兵丁呐喊。

lineList.en: Doth the hawk fly by thy wisdom, and stretch her wings toward the south?
lineList.cn: 鹰雀飞翔，展开翅膀一直向南，岂是藉你的智慧吗。

lineList.en: Doth the eagle mount up at thy command, and make her nest on high?
lineList.cn: 大鹰上腾在高处搭窝，岂是听你的吩咐吗。

lineList.en: She dwelleth and abideth on the rock, upon the crag of the rock, and the strong place.
lineList.cn: 它住在山岩，以山峰和坚固之所为家，

lineList.en: From thence she seeketh the prey, and her eyes behold afar off.
lineList.cn: 从那里窥看食物，眼睛远远观望。

lineList.en: Her young ones also suck up blood: and where the slain are, there is she.
lineList.cn: 它的雏也咂血。被杀的人在那里。它也在那里。
